Uses of Interface
com.forgerock.reactive.Single

  • Packages that use Single 
    Package Description
    com.forgerock.reactive
    Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure.

    • Uses of Single in com.forgerock.reactive

      Transforms asynchronously the value emitted by this single into another.

      Creates a bridge from callback world to Single.
      Single<V> Single.onErrorResumeWith(org.forgerock.util.Function<Throwable,Single<V>,Exception> function)
      When an error occurs in this stream, continue the processing with the new Single provided by the function.
      static <V> Single<V> RxJavaStreams.singleError(Throwable error)
      Create a new Single from the given error.
      static <V> Single<V> RxJavaStreams.singleFrom(V value)
      Create a new Single from the given value.

      Create a new Single from the given Publisher.
      <V> Single<V> Completable.toSingle(V value)
      Returns a Single which will complete with the provided value once this Completable completes.
